body: Choose one tactic. The commander always knows this tactic, and the commander's army can use this tactic even if it doesn't know that tactic on its own. You can select this boon multiple times; each time you select it, choose a new tactic.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Mass Combat/Commanders/Boons/Bonus Tactic
name: Bonus Tactic
